text.content:
Progress - Misc
Caller: Provider
Concerning: HTN and lab results.
Urgency: non-urgent
Provider: Doctor1
Patient: PatientLast, PatientFirst
Next Scheduled Appointment: none.

Subjective
Patient reports her blood pressures as taken at home (5 values taken over the 
last 2 weeks).  SBP ranged from 109 to 129 and DBP ranged from 63 to 78.

Assessment and Plan

Hypertension
Assessment
Control of Hypertension is improved.
BP as checked at home is now within goal range of less than 130/80.
Plan
Continue Chlorthalidone 25 mg daily to decrease SBP and DBP
Continue Lisinopril 40 mg daily to decrease DBP and SBP

Misc.
Plan
I informed pt that all her labs came back normal except for her kidney tests 
which are a little high, suggesting she may be mildly dehydrated; I recommended 
she drink more fluids to keep herself well hydrated and instructed her to 
continue her medications as currently prescribed.
text.author: PROVIDER,ONE
